name: Sylvania Families: Fashion Designer ni Naritai! Kurumi Risu no Onna no Ko
summary: Sylvania Families: Fashion Designer ni Naritai! Kurumi Risu no Onna no Ko is a Role-Playing game, published by Epoch, which was released in Japan in 2004.
